item.title: Martini, Go - For a Backend Application
item.author: Peter Aba
item.description:
I gave a presentation on “Martini, Go - For a Backend Application” at the Backend Web Berlin Usergroup in May of 2014. These were the slides for my presentation.

Martini, Go - For a Backend Application
